name: Ray Wenzel
biography: Raymond Wenzel is a wallcoverings, textiles, and laminate surface designer. He has worked extensively with crafts people and manufacturers in the U.S., South America, Europe and Asia. Wenzel operated his own fabric printing and painting workshop in New York City and taught surface design at both Parsons School of Design and the Fashion Institute of Technology in New York. He received his BFA from Carnegie-Mellon University.
